subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alderson, the general manager, discussed a plan with Harvey that would keep him in the rotation, but whether it passes muster with Scott Boras, Harvey’s forceful agent, remains to be seen.
snippet: Alderson, the general manager, discussed a plan with Harvey that would keep him in the rotation, but whether it passes muster with Scott Boras, Harvey’s forceful agent, remains to be seen.
